abstract: Dennis J. Kucinich pressed the Securities and Exchange Commission to expand its investigation of possible violations of securities laws by Bank of America in its shotgun marriage to Merrill Lynch.
snippet: Dennis J. Kucinich pressed the Securities and Exchange Commission to expand its investigation of possible violations of securities laws by Bank of America in its shotgun marriage to Merrill Lynch.
lead_paragraph: Dennis J. Kucinich, Democrat of Ohio, pressed the Securities and Exchange Commission on Tuesday to expand its investigation of possible violations of securities laws by Bank of America in its shotgun marriage to Merrill Lynch.

headline.main: Kucinich Urges Expanded Probe of Merrill Deal
